alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 19 at 4:02AM MDT until October 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226, 227, 231, AND 234... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226, 227, 231 and 234. * Winds...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
